sections.heading: faith of children; preservation
sections.text: The religious faith of children coming under the jurisdiction of public welfare officials shall be preserved and protected.SourceLaws 1935, Spec. Sess., c. 30, § 9, p. 184;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 43-509;R.S.1943, § 43-509.

43-509.Religious faith of children; preservation.

The religious faith of children coming under the jurisdiction of public welfare officials shall be preserved and protected.

SourceLaws 1935, Spec. Sess., c. 30, § 9, p. 184;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 43-509;R.S.1943, § 43-509.
